resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76762</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76762</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>fc087849-d280-4bb6-a11e-9aad39fc4486#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A csontváz</string>
            <string language="en">The skeleton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Skelett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le squelette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O esqueleto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scheletro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκελετός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El esqueleto</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A csontok szerkezete és kapcsolódása; a koponya, a törzsváz és a végtagok; a vázrendszer elváltozásai, sérülései</string>
            <string language="en">The construction and connection of bones; the skull, the trunk and the limbs; changes and injuries of skeletal system. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">mozgás,  csontváz,  csontok,  </string>
            <string language="en">movement, skeletons, bones</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Aufbau und der Anschluß der Knochen; 
der Schädel, das Kabel und die Glieder; Änderungen und 
Verletzungen des skelettartigen Systems.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La construction et la connexion des os ; le
crâne, le joncteur réseau et les membres ; changements et 
dommages de système squelettique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A construção e a conexão dos ossos; o 
skull, o tronco e os membros; mudanças e ferimentos do sistema 
esqueletal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La costruzione ed il collegamento delle ossa; 
il cranio, il tronco e le membra; cambiamenti e lesioni 
del sistema scheletrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατασκευή και η σύνδεση των κόκκαλων  το 
κρανίο, ο κορμός και τα κλαδιά  αλλαγές και τραυματισμοί 
του σκελετικού συστήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La construcción y la conexión de huesos; 
el cráneo, el tronco y los miembros; cambios y lesiones 
del sistema esquelético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung, Skelette, Knochen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement, squelettes, os</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento, esqueletos, ossos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento, scheletri, ossa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετακίνηση, σκελετοί, κόκκαλα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento, esqueletos, huesos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">12-14</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76762</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=fc087849-d280-4bb6-a11e-9aad39fc4486&v=1&b=5</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
